name: The Floor is Lava (itch) (A++ dev)
description:
This game is about a cube who has to avoid lava. right now you can choose when to make the lava rise up but there is also lava bubbles are coming down(experimental) so you have to constantly be moving with optional coins, a timer, and maps.

This Game is in development and updates are planned. if you want to watch me make this game then go to https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvfruRr5Heh7Kz3W2re4YNw   .
